163.movie_plot: An ordinary man sees a bright light descend from the sky, and discovers he now has super-intelligence and telekinesis.

143.movie_plot: A prep school student needing money agrees to "babysit" a blind man, but the job is not at all what he anticipated.

11.movie_plot: NASA must devise a strategy to return Apollo 13 to Earth safely after the spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage putting the lives of the three astronauts on board in jeopardy.

17.movie_plot: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends vow to rescue him, but Woody finds the idea of immortality in a museum tempting.

57.movie_plot: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt lead by a seasoned US Marshall.

109.movie_plot: Shortly before an election, a spin-doctor and a Hollywood producer join efforts to fabricate a war in order to cover up a Presidential sex scandal.

126.movie_plot: In Casablanca in December 1941, a cynical American expatriate encounters a former lover, with unforeseen complications.

239.movie_plot: A British soldier kidnapped by IRA terrorists soon befriends one of his captors, who then becomes drawn into the soldier's world.

119.movie_plot: When a woman's long-time friend reveals he's engaged, she realizes she loves him herself and sets out to get him, with only days before the wedding.

8.movie_plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazi Germans.

181.movie_plot: An ingenue insinuates herself into the company of an established but aging stage actress and her circle of theater friends.

82.movie_name: Bridge on the River Kwai, The (1957)

117.movie_plot: A man in a legal but hurtful business needs an escort for some social events, and hires a beautiful prostitute he meets... only to fall in love.

172.movie_name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb (1963)
172.movie_plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

204.movie_plot: Kermit and his newfound friends trek across America to find success in Hollywood, but a frog legs merchant is after Kermit.

49.movie_plot: A man visits his old friend's hotel and finds a gangster running things. As a hurricane approaches, the two end up confronting each other.

171.movie_plot: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

60.movie_plot: A poor Midwest family is forced off their land. They travel to California, suffering the misfortunes of the homeless in the Great Depression.

92.movie_plot: New Orleans District Attorney Jim Garrison discovers there's more to the Kennedy assassination than the official story.

26.movie_plot: When a man goes for virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or does he?

122.movie_plot: Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.

100.movie_plot: A middle-aged woman finds herself in the middle of a huge conflict that will either make her a profit or cost her life.

28.movie_plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

160.movie_plot: A couple of high school grads spend one final night cruising the strip with their buddies before they go off to college.

235.movie_plot: A noble underachiever and a beautiful valedictorian fall in love the summer before she goes off to college.

114.movie_plot: Lion cub and future king Simba searches for his identity. His eagerness to please others and penchant for testing his boundaries sometimes gets him into trouble.

197.movie_plot: Two desperate people have a wonderful romance, but their political views and convictions drive them apart.

61.movie_plot: A single mother and waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery.

145.movie_plot: In the midst of trying to legitimize his business dealings in New York City and Italy in 1979, aging Mafia Don Michael Corleone seeks to avow for his sins, while taking his nephew Vincent Mancini under his wing.

66.movie_plot: When a childless couple of an ex-con and an ex-cop decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintuplets, their lives become more complicated than they anticipated.

1.movie_plot: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him a story called The Princess Bride.

193.movie_plot: A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.

214.movie_plot: Stranded on an island, a group of schoolboys degenerate into savagery.

89.movie_plot: An intimate portrait of the controversial cartoonist and his traumatized family.

242.movie_name: Some Folks Call It a Sling Blade (1993)
242.movie_plot: Twenty-five years after commiting a double murder, Karl Childers is going to be released from an institution for the criminally insane. A local reporter comes to talk to him, and after some...

71.movie_name: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid (1969)
71.movie_plot: Two Western bank/train robbers flee to Bolivia when the law gets too close.

240.movie_plot: A family's home is haunted by a host of ghosts.

116.movie_plot: Loretta Castorini, a bookkeeper from Brooklyn, New York, finds herself in a difficult situation when she falls for the brother of the man she has agreed to marry.

188.movie_plot: Lovers undo a hairdresser from Beverly Hills around Election Eve in 1968.

166.movie_plot: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.
